text: Nicola McGivern (born 7 December 1966) is a British equestrian. She competed in two events at the 2004 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:British female equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Great Britain Category:Equestrians at the 2004 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Stirling
title: Nicola McGivern
